airdropERC1155(address,address,(address,.details: The token-owner should approve target tokens to Airdrop contract,                   which acts as operator for the tokens.

params.contents: List containing recipient, tokenId to airdrop.
params.tokenAddress: The contract address of the tokens to transfer.
params.tokenOwner: The owner of the tokens to transfer.

airdropERC1155(address,address,(address,.notice: Lets contract-owner send ERC1155 tokens to a list of addresses.
